TEXT.TITLE: TEVA PHARMACEUTICAL <TEVIY.O> LISTED ON NASDAQ
TEXT.BODY: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd said its shares are now quoted on the NASDAQ national market system. The company said its shares previously were quoted on the Nasdaq national market list. Reuter
